Description: Extract functional and non-functional requirements from natural language text
Identify and categorize entities (e.g., actors, objects) in requirement texts
Identify grammatical categories of words (e.g., nouns, verbs) in requirement texts
Analyze grammatical structure of requirement sentences
Determine sentiment (e.g., positive, negative) of stakeholders towards requirements
Identify underlying themes and topics in large requirement datasets
Classify requirements into categories (e.g., functional, non-functional)
Retrieve relevant requirements from large datasets based on search queries
Analyze linguistic complexity of requirements to estimate implementation effort
Use NLP to prioritize requirements based on stakeholder feedback and sentiment analysis
Identify ambiguous or unclear requirements using NLP techniques
